name: AlphaBuild(Assignment 7)_Purav_Patel
description:
Purav Patel (IT-201 Thursday class)

Assignment 7 - Alpha Build

The objectives of the game is to collect valuable gems to go to next level.  There are obstacles in it like the antagonist (thief ) will try to steal the gems so the player to save himself by not getting robbed and need to collect all the gems too. 

 The controls of the game are up and down keys to move up and down respectively and right and left arrows to move in right and left directions. Space is to shoot.
